description: Test suite for the Agent class and various tools in the agno project, focusing on AWS Claude model interactions, tool usage, streaming responses, and custom tools.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the agent and Claude model, verifying response content and tool calls.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response from the agent, ensuring tool call events are captured and response content is accumulated.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage, verifying response content and tool calls.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test, verifying tool call events and response content contains expected data.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response, verifying the number of function calls and content.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools being called, verifying content includes expected keywords.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters, verifying response content.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters, verifying response content.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that handles list parameters, verifying the correct functions are called and response content.
